## Step 4: State Management (Context)

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/state/FinanceContext.tsx
import React, { createContext, useContext, useReducer, useEffect, type ReactNode } from 'react';
import {
  Currency,
  Theme,
  Expense,
  IncomeState,
  IncomeFrequency,
  DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
} from '@/types';
import { loadFromStorage, saveToStorage } from '@/utils/storage';

// ---------- State shape ----------
interface State {
  income: IncomeState;
  expenses: Expense[];
  currency: Currency;
  theme: Theme;
}

const STORAGE_KEY = 'vibe_finance_state';

function getInitialState(): State {
  return loadFromStorage<State>(STORAGE_KEY, {
    income: { baseAmount: 4500, frequency: 'monthly' },
    expenses: DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
    currency: 'GBP',
    theme: 'dark',
  });
}

// ---------- Actions ----------
type Action =
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT'; payload: number }
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY'; payload: IncomeFrequency }
  | { type: 'ADD_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE'; payload: string }
  | { type: 'SET_CURRENCY'; payload: Currency }
  | { type: 'SET_THEME'; payload: Theme }
  | { type: 'TOGGLE_THEME' };

function reducer(state: State, action: Action): State {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, baseAmount: action.payload } };
    case 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, frequency: action.payload } };
    case 'ADD_EXPENSE':
      return { ...state, expenses: [...state.expenses, action.payload] };
    case 'UPDATE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.map((e) =>
          e.id === action.payload.id ? action.payload : e
        ),
      };
    case 'REMOVE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.filter((e) => e.id !== action.payload),
      };
    case 'SET_CURRENCY':
      return { ...state, currency: action.payload };
    case 'SET_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: action.payload };
    case 'TOGGLE_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: state.theme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark' };
    default:
      return state;
  }
}

// ---------- Context ----------
interface FinanceContextValue {
  state: State;
  dispatch: React.Dispatch<Action>;
}

const FinanceContext = createContext<FinanceContextValue | null>(null);

export function FinanceProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, undefined, getInitialState);

  // Persist to localStorage on every state change
  useEffect(() => {
    saveToStorage(STORAGE_KEY, state);
  }, [state]);

  // Apply theme class to document
  useEffect(() => {
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', state.theme);
  }, [state.theme]);

  return (
    <FinanceContext.Provider value={{ state, dispatch }}>
      {children}
    </FinanceContext.Provider>
  );
}

export function useFinance(): FinanceContextValue {
  const ctx = useContext(FinanceContext);
  if (!ctx) throw new Error('useFinance must be used within FinanceProvider');
  return ctx;
}
````

## Step 5: Custom Hooks

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/hooks/useCalculations.ts
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import {
  getMonthlyIncome,
  getTotalMonthlyExpenses,
  getMonthlySavings,
  getSavingsRate,
  getAnnualSavings,
  getAnnualIncome,
} from '@/utils/calculations';

export function useCalculations() {
  const { state } = useFinance();
  const { income, expenses } = state;

  return {
    monthlyIncome: getMonthlyIncome(income),
    annualIncome: getAnnualIncome(income),
    totalMonthlyExpenses: getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses),
    monthlySavings: getMonthlySavings(income, expenses),
    annualSavings: getAnnualSavings(income, expenses),
    savingsRate: getSavingsRate(income, expenses),
  };
}

## Step 7: Donut Chart Component

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/charts/DonutChart.tsx
// TODO: Replace with AppComponentLibrary chart component if available
import React from 'react';

interface DonutSegment {
  label: string;
  value: number;
  color: string;
}

interface DonutChartProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  centerLabel?: string;
  centerValue?: string;
  size?: number;
}

export function DonutChart({
  segments,
  centerLabel,
  centerValue,
  size = 220,
}: DonutChartProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((sum, s) => sum + s.value, 0);
  if (total === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
        <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
          <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="38" fill="none" stroke="var(--color-border)" strokeWidth="12" />
        </svg>
        <div className="donut-center">
          <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue ?? '0'}</span>
          {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  const radius = 38;
  const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * radius;
  let cumulativeOffset = 0;

  return (
    <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
      <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
        {segments.map((seg, i) => {
          const pct = seg.value / total;
          const dashLength = pct * circumference;
          const dashGap = circumference - dashLength;
          const offset = cumulativeOffset;
          cumulativeOffset += dashLength;

          return (
            <circle
              key={i}
              cx="50"
              cy="50"
              r={radius}
              fill="none"
              stroke={seg.color}
              strokeWidth="12"
              strokeDasharray={`${dashLength} ${dashGap}`}
              strokeDashoffset={-offset}
              strokeLinecap="butt"
              style={{ transform: 'rotate(-90deg)', transformOrigin: '50% 50%' }}
            />
          );
        })}
      </svg>
      <div className="donut-center">
        {centerValue && <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue}</span>}
        {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

interface DonutLegendProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  formatValue?: (v: number) => string;
}

export function DonutLegend({ segments, formatValue }: DonutLegendProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((s, seg) => s + seg.value, 0);
  return (
    <div className="donut-legend">
      {segments.map((seg, i) => (
        <div key={i} className="donut-legend-item">
          <span className="donut-legend-swatch" style={{ backgroundColor: seg.color }} />
          <span className="donut-legend-value">
            {formatValue ? formatValue(seg.value) : seg.value}
          </span>
          <span className="donut-legend-label">{seg.label}</span>
          {total > 0 && (
            <span className="donut-legend-pct">
              {Math.round((seg.value / total) * 100)}%
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}

import React from 'react';

      <Input
        prefix={symbol}
        type="number"
        value={state.income.baseAmount || ''}
        onChange={handleAmountChange}
        placeholder="0"
        className="income-input"
      />

// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ExpenseRow.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Expense, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS, EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS } from '@/types';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';

interface ExpenseRowProps {
  expense: Expense;
}

export function ExpenseRow({ expense }: ExpenseRowProps) {
  const { state, dispatch } = useFinance();
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[state.currency];
  const [showIconPicker, setShowIconPicker] = useState(false);

  const handleNameChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, name: e.target.value },
    });
  };

  const handleAmountChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    const num = parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0;
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, amount: num },
    });
  };

  const handleIconSelect = (icon: string) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, icon },
    });
    setShowIconPicker(false);
  };

  const handleRemove = () => {
    dispatch({ type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE', payload: expense.id });
  };

  return (
    <div className="expense-row">
      <div className="expense-icon-wrapper">
        <button
          className="expense-icon-btn"
          onClick={() => setShowIconPicker(!showIconPicker)}
          title="Change icon"
          type="button"
        >
          {expense.icon}
        </button>
        {showIconPicker && (
          <div className="icon-picker">
            {EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS.map((icon) => (
              <button
                key={icon}
                className="icon-picker-item"
                onClick={() => handleIconSelect(icon)}
                type="button"
              >
                {icon}
              </button>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
      <input
        className="expense-name-input"
        value={expense.name}
        onChange={handleNameChange}
        placeholder="Category"
      />
      <div className="expense-amount-wrapper">
        <span className="expense-amount-prefix">{symbol}</span>
        <input
          className="expense-amount-input"
          type="number"
          value={expense.amount || ''}
          onChange={handleAmountChange}
          placeholder="0"
        />
      </div>
      <button className="expense-remove-btn" onClick={handleRemove} title="Remove" type="button">
        ✕
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ChartSection.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import { useCalculations } from '@/hooks/useCalculations';
import { DonutChart, DonutLegend } from '@/components/charts/DonutChart';
import { Panel } from '@/components/ui/Panel';
import { formatCurrency } from '@/utils/format';

const EXPENSE_COLORS = [
  '#3ecf8e', '#4fc3f7', '#ffb74d', '#e57373',
  '#ba68c8', '#4dd0e1', '#fff176', '#a1887f',
  '#90a4ae', '#f06292', '#aed581', '#7986cb',
];

const SAVINGS_COLOR = '#1de9b6';

export function ChartSection() {
  const { state } = useFinance();
  const calc = useCalculations();
  const { currency, expenses } = state;

  const expenseSegments = expenses
    .filter((e) => e.amount > 0)
    .map((e, i) => ({
      label: e.name || 'Unnamed',
      value: e.amount,
      color: EXPENSE_COLORS[i % EXPENSE_COLORS.length],
    }));

  const savingsSegment = {
    label: 'Savings',
    value: Math.max(0, calc.monthlySavings),
    color: SAVINGS_COLOR,
  };

  const allSegments = [...expenseSegments, savingsSegment];

  return (
    <Panel className="chart-section">
      <div className="chart-container">
        <DonutChart
          segments={allSegments}
          centerValue={formatCurrency(calc.totalMonthlyExpenses, currency)}
          centerLabel="Total Expenses"
          size={240}
        />
        <div className="chart-side-labels">
          {calc.monthlySavings > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--savings">
              <span className="chart-side-value">{formatCurrency(calc.monthlySavings, currency)}</span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">Savings</span>
            </div>
          )}
          {expenses.filter(e => e.amount > 0).length > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--top-expense">
              <span className="chart-side-value">
                {formatCurrency(
                  Math.max(...expenses.map((e) => e.amount)),
                  currency
                )}
              </span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">
                {expenses.reduce((a, b) => (a.amount > b.amount ? a : b), expenses[0])?.name}
              </span>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
      <DonutLegend
        segments={allSegments}
        formatValue={(v) => formatCurrency(v, currency)}
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}
````

import React from 'react';

export function PlaceholderPage() {

  const pageName = location.pathname
    .replace('/', '')
    .replace(/-/g, ' ')
    .replace(/\b\w/g, (c) => c.toUpperCase()) || 'Page';

  return (
    <div className="placeholder-page">
      <div className="placeholder-content">
        <h1>{pageName}</h1>
        <p>Coming soon.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

/* ========================================

.header {
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0 24px;
  height: 56px;
  background: var(--header-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.header-left {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.header-logo {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
}

.header-title {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.header-nav {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  margin-left: 12px;
}

.header-nav-link {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: color var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast);
}

.header-nav-link:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.header-nav-link--active {
  color: var(--color-accent);

}

.header-right {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

/* ========================================
   PANEL
   ======================================== */

.panel {
  background: var(--color-bg-panel);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: 20px;
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
}

.btn--sm {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}
.btn--md {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
.btn--lg {
  padding: 14px 28px;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.btn--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn--primary {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-accent), var(--color-accent-hover));
  color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 12px var(--color-accent-glow);
}
.btn--primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--secondary {
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

  border-color: var(--color-accent);
}

.btn--ghost {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}
.btn--ghost:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--danger {
  background: var(--color-danger);
  color: #fff;
}

/* ========================================
   INPUTS
   ======================================== */

.input-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 6px;
}

.input-label {

## Step 3: Utility Functions

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/calculations.ts
import { Expense, IncomeState } from '@/types';

export function getMonthlyIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'annually') {
    return income.baseAmount / 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getAnnualIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'monthly') {
    return income.baseAmount * 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return expenses.reduce((sum, e) => sum + e.amount, 0);
}

export function getMonthlySavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlyIncome(income) - getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses);
}

export function getSavingsRate(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  const monthly = getMonthlyIncome(income);
  if (monthly <= 0) return 0;
  const savings = getMonthlySavings(income, expenses);
  return Math.round((savings / monthly) * 100);
}

export function getAnnualSavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlySavings(income, expenses) * 12;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/format.ts
import { Currency, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS } from '@/types';

export function formatCurrency(amount: number, currency: Currency): string {
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[currency];
  const absAmount = Math.abs(amount);
  const formatted = absAmount.toLocaleString('en-GB', {
    minimumFractionDigits: 0,
    maximumFractionDigits: 0,
  });
  return amount < 0 ? `-${symbol}${formatted}` : `${symbol}${formatted}`;
}

export function formatPercent(value: number): string {
  return `${value}%`;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/storage.ts
export function loadFromStorage<T>(key: string, fallback: T): T {
  try {
    const raw = localStorage.getItem(key);
    if (raw === null) return fallback;
    return JSON.parse(raw) as T;
  } catch {
    return fallback;
  }
}

export function saveToStorage<T>(key: string, value: T): void {
  try {
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(value));
  } catch {
    // silently fail
  }
}
````

## Step 4: State Management (Context)

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/state/FinanceContext.tsx
import React, { createContext, useContext, useReducer, useEffect, type ReactNode } from 'react';
import {
  Currency,
  Theme,
  Expense,
  IncomeState,
  IncomeFrequency,
  DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
} from '@/types';
import { loadFromStorage, saveToStorage } from '@/utils/storage';

// ---------- State shape ----------
interface State {
  income: IncomeState;
  expenses: Expense[];
  currency: Currency;
  theme: Theme;
}

const STORAGE_KEY = 'vibe_finance_state';

function getInitialState(): State {
  return loadFromStorage<State>(STORAGE_KEY, {
    income: { baseAmount: 4500, frequency: 'monthly' },
    expenses: DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
    currency: 'GBP',
    theme: 'dark',
  });
}

// ---------- Actions ----------
type Action =
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT'; payload: number }
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY'; payload: IncomeFrequency }
  | { type: 'ADD_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE'; payload: string }
  | { type: 'SET_CURRENCY'; payload: Currency }
  | { type: 'SET_THEME'; payload: Theme }
  | { type: 'TOGGLE_THEME' };

function reducer(state: State, action: Action): State {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, baseAmount: action.payload } };
    case 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, frequency: action.payload } };
    case 'ADD_EXPENSE':
      return { ...state, expenses: [...state.expenses, action.payload] };
    case 'UPDATE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.map((e) =>
          e.id === action.payload.id ? action.payload : e
        ),
      };
    case 'REMOVE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.filter((e) => e.id !== action.payload),
      };
    case 'SET_CURRENCY':
      return { ...state, currency: action.payload };
    case 'SET_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: action.payload };
    case 'TOGGLE_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: state.theme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark' };
    default:
      return state;
  }
}

// ---------- Context ----------
interface FinanceContextValue {
  state: State;
  dispatch: React.Dispatch<Action>;
}

const FinanceContext = createContext<FinanceContextValue | null>(null);

export function FinanceProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, undefined, getInitialState);

  // Persist to localStorage on every state change
  useEffect(() => {
    saveToStorage(STORAGE_KEY, state);
  }, [state]);

  // Apply theme class to document
  useEffect(() => {
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', state.theme);
  }, [state.theme]);

  return (
    <FinanceContext.Provider value={{ state, dispatch }}>
      {children}
    </FinanceContext.Provider>
  );
}

export function useFinance(): FinanceContextValue {
  const ctx = useContext(FinanceContext);
  if (!ctx) throw new Error('useFinance must be used within FinanceProvider');
  return ctx;
}
````

// filepath: vibe_finance/src/hooks/useCalculations.ts
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import {
  getMonthlyIncome,
  getTotalMonthlyExpenses,
  getMonthlySavings,
  getSavingsRate,
  getAnnualSavings,

} from '@/utils/calculations';

export function useCalculations() {

  return {
    monthlyIncome: getMonthlyIncome(income),
    annualIncome: getAnnualIncome(income),
    totalMonthlyExpenses: getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses),
    monthlySavings: getMonthlySavings(income, expenses),
    annualSavings: getAnnualSavings(income, expenses),
    savingsRate: getSavingsRate(income, expenses),
  };
}

## Step 7: Donut Chart Component

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/charts/DonutChart.tsx
// TODO: Replace with AppComponentLibrary chart component if available
import React from 'react';

interface DonutSegment {
  label: string;
  value: number;
  color: string;
}

interface DonutChartProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  centerLabel?: string;
  centerValue?: string;
  size?: number;
}

export function DonutChart({
  segments,
  centerLabel,
  centerValue,
  size = 220,
}: DonutChartProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((sum, s) => sum + s.value, 0);
  if (total === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
        <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
          <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="38" fill="none" stroke="var(--color-border)" strokeWidth="12" />
        </svg>
        <div className="donut-center">
          <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue ?? '0'}</span>
          {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  const radius = 38;
  const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * radius;
  let cumulativeOffset = 0;

  return (
    <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
      <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
        {segments.map((seg, i) => {
          const pct = seg.value / total;
          const dashLength = pct * circumference;
          const dashGap = circumference - dashLength;
          const offset = cumulativeOffset;
          cumulativeOffset += dashLength;

          return (
            <circle
              key={i}
              cx="50"
              cy="50"
              r={radius}
              fill="none"
              stroke={seg.color}
              strokeWidth="12"
              strokeDasharray={`${dashLength} ${dashGap}`}
              strokeDashoffset={-offset}
              strokeLinecap="butt"
              style={{ transform: 'rotate(-90deg)', transformOrigin: '50% 50%' }}
            />
          );
        })}
      </svg>
      <div className="donut-center">
        {centerValue && <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue}</span>}
        {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

interface DonutLegendProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  formatValue?: (v: number) => string;
}

export function DonutLegend({ segments, formatValue }: DonutLegendProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((s, seg) => s + seg.value, 0);
  return (
    <div className="donut-legend">
      {segments.map((seg, i) => (
        <div key={i} className="donut-legend-item">
          <span className="donut-legend-swatch" style={{ backgroundColor: seg.color }} />
          <span className="donut-legend-value">
            {formatValue ? formatValue(seg.value) : seg.value}
          </span>
          <span className="donut-legend-label">{seg.label}</span>
          {total > 0 && (
            <span className="donut-legend-pct">
              {Math.round((seg.value / total) * 100)}%
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}
````

// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/IncomeSection.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import { Panel } from '@/components/ui/Panel';
import { Input } from '@/components/ui/Input';
import { Toggle } from '@/components/ui/Toggle';
import { CURRENCY_SYMBOLS, IncomeFrequency } from '@/types';

const FREQ_OPTIONS = [
  { label: 'Monthly', value: 'monthly' },
  { label: 'Annually', value: 'annually' },
];

export function IncomeSection() {
  const { state, dispatch } = useFinance();
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[state.currency];

  const handleAmountChange = (val: string) => {
    const num = parseFloat(val) || 0;
    dispatch({ type: 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT', payload: num });
  };

  return (
    <Panel className="income-section">
      <div className="income-header">
        <span className="section-label">Monthly Income</span>
        <Toggle
          options={FREQ_OPTIONS}
          value={state.income.frequency}
          onChange={(v) =>
            dispatch({ type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY', payload: v as IncomeFrequency })
          }
        />
      </div>
      <Input
        prefix={symbol}
        type="number"
        value={state.income.baseAmount || ''}
        onChange={handleAmountChange}
        placeholder="0"
        className="income-input"
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ExpenseRow.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Expense, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS, EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS } from '@/types';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';

interface ExpenseRowProps {
  expense: Expense;
}

export function ExpenseRow({ expense }: ExpenseRowProps) {
  const { state, dispatch } = useFinance();
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[state.currency];
  const [showIconPicker, setShowIconPicker] = useState(false);

  const handleNameChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, name: e.target.value },
    });
  };

  const handleAmountChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    const num = parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0;
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, amount: num },
    });
  };

  const handleIconSelect = (icon: string) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, icon },
    });
    setShowIconPicker(false);
  };

  const handleRemove = () => {
    dispatch({ type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE', payload: expense.id });
  };

  return (
    <div className="expense-row">
      <div className="expense-icon-wrapper">
        <button
          className="expense-icon-btn"
          onClick={() => setShowIconPicker(!showIconPicker)}
          title="Change icon"
          type="button"
        >
          {expense.icon}
        </button>
        {showIconPicker && (
          <div className="icon-picker">
            {EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS.map((icon) => (
              <button
                key={icon}
                className="icon-picker-item"
                onClick={() => handleIconSelect(icon)}
                type="button"
              >
                {icon}
              </button>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
      <input
        className="expense-name-input"
        value={expense.name}
        onChange={handleNameChange}
        placeholder="Category"
      />
      <div className="expense-amount-wrapper">
        <span className="expense-amount-prefix">{symbol}</span>
        <input
          className="expense-amount-input"
          type="number"
          value={expense.amount || ''}
          onChange={handleAmountChange}
          placeholder="0"
        />
      </div>
      <button className="expense-remove-btn" onClick={handleRemove} title="Remove" type="button">
        ✕
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ChartSection.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import { useCalculations } from '@/hooks/useCalculations';
import { DonutChart, DonutLegend } from '@/components/charts/DonutChart';
import { Panel } from '@/components/ui/Panel';
import { formatCurrency } from '@/utils/format';

const EXPENSE_COLORS = [
  '#3ecf8e', '#4fc3f7', '#ffb74d', '#e57373',
  '#ba68c8', '#4dd0e1', '#fff176', '#a1887f',
  '#90a4ae', '#f06292', '#aed581', '#7986cb',
];

const SAVINGS_COLOR = '#1de9b6';

export function ChartSection() {
  const { state } = useFinance();
  const calc = useCalculations();
  const { currency, expenses } = state;

  const expenseSegments = expenses
    .filter((e) => e.amount > 0)
    .map((e, i) => ({
      label: e.name || 'Unnamed',
      value: e.amount,
      color: EXPENSE_COLORS[i % EXPENSE_COLORS.length],
    }));

  const savingsSegment = {
    label: 'Savings',
    value: Math.max(0, calc.monthlySavings),
    color: SAVINGS_COLOR,
  };

  const allSegments = [...expenseSegments, savingsSegment];

  return (
    <Panel className="chart-section">
      <div className="chart-container">
        <DonutChart
          segments={allSegments}
          centerValue={formatCurrency(calc.totalMonthlyExpenses, currency)}
          centerLabel="Total Expenses"
          size={240}
        />
        <div className="chart-side-labels">
          {calc.monthlySavings > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--savings">
              <span className="chart-side-value">{formatCurrency(calc.monthlySavings, currency)}</span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">Savings</span>
            </div>
          )}
          {expenses.filter(e => e.amount > 0).length > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--top-expense">
              <span className="chart-side-value">
                {formatCurrency(
                  Math.max(...expenses.map((e) => e.amount)),
                  currency
                )}
              </span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">
                {expenses.reduce((a, b) => (a.amount > b.amount ? a : b), expenses[0])?.name}
              </span>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
      <DonutLegend
        segments={allSegments}
        formatValue={(v) => formatCurrency(v, currency)}
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}
````

import React from 'react';
import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom';

export function PlaceholderPage() {
  const location = useLocation();
  const pageName = location.pathname
    .replace('/', '')
    .replace(/-/g, ' ')
    .replace(/\b\w/g, (c) => c.toUpperCase()) || 'Page';

  return (
    <div className="placeholder-page">
      <div className="placeholder-content">
        <h1>{pageName}</h1>
        <p>Coming soon.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

  padding: 20px;
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
}

.btn--sm {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}
.btn--md {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
.btn--lg {
  padding: 14px 28px;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.btn--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn--primary {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-accent), var(--color-accent-hover));
  color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 12px var(--color-accent-glow);
}
.btn--primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--secondary {
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}
.btn--secondary:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-accent);
}

.btn--ghost {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}
.btn--ghost:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--danger {
  background: var(--color-danger);
  color: #fff;
}

/* ========================================
   INPUTS
   ======================================== */

.input-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 6px;
}

.input-label {
  font-size: 0.82rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

.input-wrapper {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast);
}

.input-wrapper:focus-within {
  border-color: var(--color-border-focus);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.input-prefix {
  padding: 10px 0 10px 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 1rem;
  user-select: none;
}

.input-field {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 10px 14px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.input-field::placeholder {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

/* Hide number spinners */
.input-field::-webkit-inner-spin-button,
.input-field::-webkit-outer-spin-button {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  margin: 0;
}
.input-field[type='number'] {
  -moz-appearance: textfield;
}

/* ========================================

## Step 3: Utility Functions

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/calculations.ts
import { Expense, IncomeState } from '@/types';

export function getMonthlyIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'annually') {
    return income.baseAmount / 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getAnnualIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'monthly') {
    return income.baseAmount * 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return expenses.reduce((sum, e) => sum + e.amount, 0);
}

export function getMonthlySavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlyIncome(income) - getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses);
}

export function getSavingsRate(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  const monthly = getMonthlyIncome(income);
  if (monthly <= 0) return 0;
  const savings = getMonthlySavings(income, expenses);
  return Math.round((savings / monthly) * 100);
}

export function getAnnualSavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlySavings(income, expenses) * 12;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/format.ts
import { Currency, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS } from '@/types';

export function formatCurrency(amount: number, currency: Currency): string {
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[currency];
  const absAmount = Math.abs(amount);
  const formatted = absAmount.toLocaleString('en-GB', {
    minimumFractionDigits: 0,
    maximumFractionDigits: 0,
  });
  return amount < 0 ? `-${symbol}${formatted}` : `${symbol}${formatted}`;
}

export function formatPercent(value: number): string {
  return `${value}%`;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/storage.ts
export function loadFromStorage<T>(key: string, fallback: T): T {
  try {
    const raw = localStorage.getItem(key);
    if (raw === null) return fallback;
    return JSON.parse(raw) as T;
  } catch {
    return fallback;
  }
}

export function saveToStorage<T>(key: string, value: T): void {
  try {
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(value));
  } catch {
    // silently fail
  }
}
````

}

## Step 4: State Management (Context)

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/state/FinanceContext.tsx
import React, { createContext, useContext, useReducer, useEffect, type ReactNode } from 'react';
import {
  Currency,
  Theme,
  Expense,
  IncomeState,
  IncomeFrequency,
  DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
} from '@/types';
import { loadFromStorage, saveToStorage } from '@/utils/storage';

// ---------- State shape ----------
interface State {
  income: IncomeState;
  expenses: Expense[];
  currency: Currency;
  theme: Theme;
}

const STORAGE_KEY = 'vibe_finance_state';

function getInitialState(): State {
  return loadFromStorage<State>(STORAGE_KEY, {
    income: { baseAmount: 4500, frequency: 'monthly' },
    expenses: DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
    currency: 'GBP',
    theme: 'dark',
  });
}

// ---------- Actions ----------
type Action =
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT'; payload: number }
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY'; payload: IncomeFrequency }
  | { type: 'ADD_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE'; payload: string }
  | { type: 'SET_CURRENCY'; payload: Currency }
  | { type: 'SET_THEME'; payload: Theme }
  | { type: 'TOGGLE_THEME' };

function reducer(state: State, action: Action): State {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, baseAmount: action.payload } };
    case 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, frequency: action.payload } };
    case 'ADD_EXPENSE':
      return { ...state, expenses: [...state.expenses, action.payload] };
    case 'UPDATE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.map((e) =>
          e.id === action.payload.id ? action.payload : e
        ),
      };
    case 'REMOVE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.filter((e) => e.id !== action.payload),
      };
    case 'SET_CURRENCY':
      return { ...state, currency: action.payload };
    case 'SET_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: action.payload };
    case 'TOGGLE_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: state.theme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark' };
    default:
      return state;
  }
}

// ---------- Context ----------
interface FinanceContextValue {
  state: State;
  dispatch: React.Dispatch<Action>;
}

const FinanceContext = createContext<FinanceContextValue | null>(null);

export function FinanceProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, undefined, getInitialState);

  // Persist to localStorage on every state change
  useEffect(() => {
    saveToStorage(STORAGE_KEY, state);
  }, [state]);

  // Apply theme class to document
  useEffect(() => {
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', state.theme);
  }, [state.theme]);

  return (
    <FinanceContext.Provider value={{ state, dispatch }}>
      {children}
    </FinanceContext.Provider>
  );
}

export function useFinance(): FinanceContextValue {
  const ctx = useContext(FinanceContext);
  if (!ctx) throw new Error('useFinance must be used within FinanceProvider');
  return ctx;
}
````

## Step 7: Donut Chart Component

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/charts/DonutChart.tsx
// TODO: Replace with AppComponentLibrary chart component if available
import React from 'react';

interface DonutSegment {
  label: string;
  value: number;
  color: string;
}

interface DonutChartProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  centerLabel?: string;
  centerValue?: string;
  size?: number;
}

export function DonutChart({
  segments,
  centerLabel,
  centerValue,
  size = 220,
}: DonutChartProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((sum, s) => sum + s.value, 0);
  if (total === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
        <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
          <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="38" fill="none" stroke="var(--color-border)" strokeWidth="12" />
        </svg>
        <div className="donut-center">
          <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue ?? '0'}</span>
          {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  const radius = 38;
  const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * radius;
  let cumulativeOffset = 0;

  return (
    <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
      <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
        {segments.map((seg, i) => {
          const pct = seg.value / total;
          const dashLength = pct * circumference;
          const dashGap = circumference - dashLength;
          const offset = cumulativeOffset;
          cumulativeOffset += dashLength;

          return (
            <circle
              key={i}
              cx="50"
              cy="50"
              r={radius}
              fill="none"
              stroke={seg.color}
              strokeWidth="12"
              strokeDasharray={`${dashLength} ${dashGap}`}
              strokeDashoffset={-offset}
              strokeLinecap="butt"
              style={{ transform: 'rotate(-90deg)', transformOrigin: '50% 50%' }}
            />
          );
        })}
      </svg>
      <div className="donut-center">
        {centerValue && <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue}</span>}
        {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

interface DonutLegendProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  formatValue?: (v: number) => string;
}

export function DonutLegend({ segments, formatValue }: DonutLegendProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((s, seg) => s + seg.value, 0);
  return (
    <div className="donut-legend">
      {segments.map((seg, i) => (
        <div key={i} className="donut-legend-item">
          <span className="donut-legend-swatch" style={{ backgroundColor: seg.color }} />
          <span className="donut-legend-value">
            {formatValue ? formatValue(seg.value) : seg.value}
          </span>
          <span className="donut-legend-label">{seg.label}</span>
          {total > 0 && (
            <span className="donut-legend-pct">
              {Math.round((seg.value / total) * 100)}%
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}
````

          value={state.currency}
          onChange={(v) => dispatch({ type: 'SET_CURRENCY', payload: v as Currency })}
          className="currency-select"
        />
        <IconButton
          onClick={() => dispatch({ type: 'TOGGLE_THEME' })}
          aria-label="Toggle theme"
          className="theme-toggle"
        >
          {state.theme === 'dark' ? '☀️' : '🌙'}
        </IconButton>
      </div>
    </header>
  );
}

// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/IncomeSection.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import { Panel } from '@/components/ui/Panel';
import { Input } from '@/components/ui/Input';
import { Toggle } from '@/components/ui/Toggle';
import { CURRENCY_SYMBOLS, IncomeFrequency } from '@/types';

const FREQ_OPTIONS = [
  { label: 'Monthly', value: 'monthly' },
  { label: 'Annually', value: 'annually' },
];

export function IncomeSection() {
  const { state, dispatch } = useFinance();
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[state.currency];

  const handleAmountChange = (val: string) => {
    const num = parseFloat(val) || 0;
    dispatch({ type: 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT', payload: num });
  };

  return (
    <Panel className="income-section">
      <div className="income-header">
        <span className="section-label">Monthly Income</span>
        <Toggle
          options={FREQ_OPTIONS}
          value={state.income.frequency}
          onChange={(v) =>
            dispatch({ type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY', payload: v as IncomeFrequency })
          }
        />
      </div>
      <Input
        prefix={symbol}
        type="number"
        value={state.income.baseAmount || ''}
        onChange={handleAmountChange}
        placeholder="0"
        className="income-input"
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ExpenseRow.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Expense, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS, EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS } from '@/types';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';

interface ExpenseRowProps {
  expense: Expense;
}

export function ExpenseRow({ expense }: ExpenseRowProps) {
  const { state, dispatch } = useFinance();
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[state.currency];
  const [showIconPicker, setShowIconPicker] = useState(false);

  const handleNameChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, name: e.target.value },
    });
  };

  const handleAmountChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    const num = parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0;
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, amount: num },
    });
  };

  const handleIconSelect = (icon: string) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, icon },
    });
    setShowIconPicker(false);
  };

  const handleRemove = () => {
    dispatch({ type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE', payload: expense.id });
  };

  return (
    <div className="expense-row">
      <div className="expense-icon-wrapper">
        <button
          className="expense-icon-btn"
          onClick={() => setShowIconPicker(!showIconPicker)}
          title="Change icon"
          type="button"
        >
          {expense.icon}
        </button>
        {showIconPicker && (
          <div className="icon-picker">
            {EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS.map((icon) => (
              <button
                key={icon}
                className="icon-picker-item"
                onClick={() => handleIconSelect(icon)}
                type="button"
              >
                {icon}
              </button>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
      <input
        className="expense-name-input"
        value={expense.name}
        onChange={handleNameChange}
        placeholder="Category"
      />
      <div className="expense-amount-wrapper">
        <span className="expense-amount-prefix">{symbol}</span>
        <input
          className="expense-amount-input"
          type="number"
          value={expense.amount || ''}
          onChange={handleAmountChange}
          placeholder="0"
        />
      </div>
      <button className="expense-remove-btn" onClick={handleRemove} title="Remove" type="button">
        ✕
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ChartSection.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import { useCalculations } from '@/hooks/useCalculations';
import { DonutChart, DonutLegend } from '@/components/charts/DonutChart';
import { Panel } from '@/components/ui/Panel';
import { formatCurrency } from '@/utils/format';

const EXPENSE_COLORS = [
  '#3ecf8e', '#4fc3f7', '#ffb74d', '#e57373',
  '#ba68c8', '#4dd0e1', '#fff176', '#a1887f',
  '#90a4ae', '#f06292', '#aed581', '#7986cb',
];

const SAVINGS_COLOR = '#1de9b6';

export function ChartSection() {
  const { state } = useFinance();
  const calc = useCalculations();
  const { currency, expenses } = state;

  const expenseSegments = expenses
    .filter((e) => e.amount > 0)
    .map((e, i) => ({
      label: e.name || 'Unnamed',
      value: e.amount,
      color: EXPENSE_COLORS[i % EXPENSE_COLORS.length],
    }));

  const savingsSegment = {
    label: 'Savings',
    value: Math.max(0, calc.monthlySavings),
    color: SAVINGS_COLOR,
  };

  const allSegments = [...expenseSegments, savingsSegment];

  return (
    <Panel className="chart-section">
      <div className="chart-container">
        <DonutChart
          segments={allSegments}
          centerValue={formatCurrency(calc.totalMonthlyExpenses, currency)}
          centerLabel="Total Expenses"
          size={240}
        />
        <div className="chart-side-labels">
          {calc.monthlySavings > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--savings">
              <span className="chart-side-value">{formatCurrency(calc.monthlySavings, currency)}</span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">Savings</span>
            </div>
          )}
          {expenses.filter(e => e.amount > 0).length > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--top-expense">
              <span className="chart-side-value">
                {formatCurrency(
                  Math.max(...expenses.map((e) => e.amount)),
                  currency
                )}
              </span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">
                {expenses.reduce((a, b) => (a.amount > b.amount ? a : b), expenses[0])?.name}
              </span>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
      <DonutLegend
        segments={allSegments}
        formatValue={(v) => formatCurrency(v, currency)}
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}
````

    .replace(/\b\w/g, (c) => c.toUpperCase()) || 'Page';

        <h1>{pageName}</h1>
        <p>Coming soon.</p>

````css
/* filepath: vibe_finance/src/styles/index.css */

/* ========================================
   CSS CUSTOM PROPERTIES / THEME
   ======================================== */

:root {
  /* Base font */
  --font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto,
    sans-serif;

  /* Sizing */
  --radius-sm: 6px;

  --radius-lg: 16px;
  --radius-xl: 20px;

  /* Transitions */
  --transition-fast: 150ms ease;
  --transition-normal: 250ms ease;
}

/* ---- Dark theme (default) ---- */
[data-theme='dark'],
:root {
  --color-bg: #0b0e17;
  --color-bg-elevated: #111827;
  --color-bg-panel: #151c2c;

  --color-accent-hover: #22925e;
  --color-accent-glow: rgba(42, 166, 109, 0.12);
  --color-danger: #d32f2f;
  --color-info: #1e88e5;
  --color-warning: #f57c00;
  --color-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --header-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
}

/* ========================================
   RESET & BASE
   ======================================== */

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  font-size: 16px;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-family);
  background-color: var(--color-bg);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  line-height: 1.6;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

button {
  font-family: inherit;
  cursor: pointer;
  border: none;
  background: none;
}

input,
select {
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
}

/* ========================================
   LAYOUT
   ======================================== */

.app-layout {
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.app-main {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 1200px;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 24px 24px 48px;
}

/* ========================================
   HEADER
   ======================================== */

.header {
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0 24px;
  height: 56px;
  background: var(--header-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.header-left {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.header-logo {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
}

.header-title {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.header-nav {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  margin-left: 12px;
}

.header-nav-link {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: color var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast);
}

.header-nav-link:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.header-nav-link--active {
  color: var(--color-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

.header-right {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

/* ========================================
   PANEL
   ======================================== */

.panel {
  background: var(--color-bg-panel);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: 20px;
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
}

.btn--sm {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}
.btn--md {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
.btn--lg {
  padding: 14px 28px;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.btn--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn--primary {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-accent), var(--color-accent-hover));
  color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 12px var(--color-accent-glow);
}
.btn--primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--secondary {
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}
.btn--secondary:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-accent);
}

.btn--ghost {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}
.btn--ghost:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--danger {
  background: var(--color-danger);
  color: #fff;
}

/* ========================================
   INPUTS
   ======================================== */

.input-group {
  display: flex;

## Step 3: Utility Functions

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/calculations.ts
import { Expense, IncomeState } from '@/types';

export function getMonthlyIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'annually') {
    return income.baseAmount / 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getAnnualIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'monthly') {
    return income.baseAmount * 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return expenses.reduce((sum, e) => sum + e.amount, 0);
}

export function getMonthlySavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlyIncome(income) - getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses);
}

export function getSavingsRate(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  const monthly = getMonthlyIncome(income);
  if (monthly <= 0) return 0;
  const savings = getMonthlySavings(income, expenses);
  return Math.round((savings / monthly) * 100);
}

export function getAnnualSavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlySavings(income, expenses) * 12;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/format.ts
import { Currency, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS } from '@/types';

export function formatCurrency(amount: number, currency: Currency): string {
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[currency];
  const absAmount = Math.abs(amount);
  const formatted = absAmount.toLocaleString('en-GB', {
    minimumFractionDigits: 0,
    maximumFractionDigits: 0,
  });
  return amount < 0 ? `-${symbol}${formatted}` : `${symbol}${formatted}`;
}

export function formatPercent(value: number): string {
  return `${value}%`;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/storage.ts
export function loadFromStorage<T>(key: string, fallback: T): T {
  try {
    const raw = localStorage.getItem(key);
    if (raw === null) return fallback;
    return JSON.parse(raw) as T;
  } catch {
    return fallback;
  }
}

export function saveToStorage<T>(key: string, value: T): void {
  try {
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(value));
  } catch {
    // silently fail
  }
}
````

}

## Step 4: State Management (Context)

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/state/FinanceContext.tsx
import React, { createContext, useContext, useReducer, useEffect, type ReactNode } from 'react';
import {
  Currency,
  Theme,
  Expense,
  IncomeState,
  IncomeFrequency,
  DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
} from '@/types';
import { loadFromStorage, saveToStorage } from '@/utils/storage';

// ---------- State shape ----------
interface State {
  income: IncomeState;
  expenses: Expense[];
  currency: Currency;
  theme: Theme;
}

const STORAGE_KEY = 'vibe_finance_state';

function getInitialState(): State {
  return loadFromStorage<State>(STORAGE_KEY, {
    income: { baseAmount: 4500, frequency: 'monthly' },
    expenses: DEFAULT_EXPENSES,
    currency: 'GBP',
    theme: 'dark',
  });
}

// ---------- Actions ----------
type Action =
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT'; payload: number }
  | { type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY'; payload: IncomeFrequency }
  | { type: 'ADD_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE'; payload: Expense }
  | { type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE'; payload: string }
  | { type: 'SET_CURRENCY'; payload: Currency }
  | { type: 'SET_THEME'; payload: Theme }
  | { type: 'TOGGLE_THEME' };

function reducer(state: State, action: Action): State {
  switch (action.type) {
    case 'SET_INCOME_AMOUNT':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, baseAmount: action.payload } };
    case 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY':
      return { ...state, income: { ...state.income, frequency: action.payload } };
    case 'ADD_EXPENSE':
      return { ...state, expenses: [...state.expenses, action.payload] };
    case 'UPDATE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.map((e) =>
          e.id === action.payload.id ? action.payload : e
        ),
      };
    case 'REMOVE_EXPENSE':
      return {
        ...state,
        expenses: state.expenses.filter((e) => e.id !== action.payload),
      };
    case 'SET_CURRENCY':
      return { ...state, currency: action.payload };
    case 'SET_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: action.payload };
    case 'TOGGLE_THEME':
      return { ...state, theme: state.theme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark' };
    default:
      return state;
  }
}

// ---------- Context ----------
interface FinanceContextValue {
  state: State;
  dispatch: React.Dispatch<Action>;
}

const FinanceContext = createContext<FinanceContextValue | null>(null);

export function FinanceProvider({ children }: { children: ReactNode }) {
  const [state, dispatch] = useReducer(reducer, undefined, getInitialState);

  // Persist to localStorage on every state change
  useEffect(() => {
    saveToStorage(STORAGE_KEY, state);
  }, [state]);

  // Apply theme class to document
  useEffect(() => {
    document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', state.theme);
  }, [state.theme]);

  return (
    <FinanceContext.Provider value={{ state, dispatch }}>
      {children}
    </FinanceContext.Provider>
  );
}

export function useFinance(): FinanceContextValue {
  const ctx = useContext(FinanceContext);
  if (!ctx) throw new Error('useFinance must be used within FinanceProvider');
  return ctx;
}
````

## Step 7: Donut Chart Component

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/charts/DonutChart.tsx
// TODO: Replace with AppComponentLibrary chart component if available
import React from 'react';

interface DonutSegment {
  label: string;
  value: number;
  color: string;
}

interface DonutChartProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  centerLabel?: string;
  centerValue?: string;
  size?: number;
}

export function DonutChart({
  segments,
  centerLabel,
  centerValue,
  size = 220,
}: DonutChartProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((sum, s) => sum + s.value, 0);
  if (total === 0) {
    return (
      <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
        <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
          <circle cx="50" cy="50" r="38" fill="none" stroke="var(--color-border)" strokeWidth="12" />
        </svg>
        <div className="donut-center">
          <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue ?? '0'}</span>
          {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
        </div>
      </div>
    );
  }

  const radius = 38;
  const circumference = 2 * Math.PI * radius;
  let cumulativeOffset = 0;

  return (
    <div className="donut-chart" style={{ width: size, height: size }}>
      <svg viewBox="0 0 100 100" className="donut-svg">
        {segments.map((seg, i) => {
          const pct = seg.value / total;
          const dashLength = pct * circumference;
          const dashGap = circumference - dashLength;
          const offset = cumulativeOffset;
          cumulativeOffset += dashLength;

          return (
            <circle
              key={i}
              cx="50"
              cy="50"
              r={radius}
              fill="none"
              stroke={seg.color}
              strokeWidth="12"
              strokeDasharray={`${dashLength} ${dashGap}`}
              strokeDashoffset={-offset}
              strokeLinecap="butt"
              style={{ transform: 'rotate(-90deg)', transformOrigin: '50% 50%' }}
            />
          );
        })}
      </svg>
      <div className="donut-center">
        {centerValue && <span className="donut-center-value">{centerValue}</span>}
        {centerLabel && <span className="donut-center-label">{centerLabel}</span>}
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

interface DonutLegendProps {
  segments: DonutSegment[];
  formatValue?: (v: number) => string;
}

export function DonutLegend({ segments, formatValue }: DonutLegendProps) {
  const total = segments.reduce((s, seg) => s + seg.value, 0);
  return (
    <div className="donut-legend">
      {segments.map((seg, i) => (
        <div key={i} className="donut-legend-item">
          <span className="donut-legend-swatch" style={{ backgroundColor: seg.color }} />
          <span className="donut-legend-value">
            {formatValue ? formatValue(seg.value) : seg.value}
          </span>
          <span className="donut-legend-label">{seg.label}</span>
          {total > 0 && (
            <span className="donut-legend-pct">
              {Math.round((seg.value / total) * 100)}%
            </span>
          )}
        </div>
      ))}
    </div>
  );
}
````

        <span className="section-label">Monthly Income</span>
        <Toggle
          options={FREQ_OPTIONS}
          value={state.income.frequency}
          onChange={(v) =>
            dispatch({ type: 'SET_INCOME_FREQUENCY', payload: v as IncomeFrequency })
          }
        />
      </div>
      <Input
        prefix={symbol}
        type="number"
        value={state.income.baseAmount || ''}
        onChange={handleAmountChange}
        placeholder="0"
        className="income-input"
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ExpenseRow.tsx
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Expense, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS, EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS } from '@/types';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';

interface ExpenseRowProps {
  expense: Expense;
}

export function ExpenseRow({ expense }: ExpenseRowProps) {
  const { state, dispatch } = useFinance();
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[state.currency];
  const [showIconPicker, setShowIconPicker] = useState(false);

  const handleNameChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, name: e.target.value },
    });
  };

  const handleAmountChange = (e: React.ChangeEvent<HTMLInputElement>) => {
    const num = parseFloat(e.target.value) || 0;
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, amount: num },
    });
  };

  const handleIconSelect = (icon: string) => {
    dispatch({
      type: 'UPDATE_EXPENSE',
      payload: { ...expense, icon },
    });
    setShowIconPicker(false);
  };

  const handleRemove = () => {
    dispatch({ type: 'REMOVE_EXPENSE', payload: expense.id });
  };

  return (
    <div className="expense-row">
      <div className="expense-icon-wrapper">
        <button
          className="expense-icon-btn"
          onClick={() => setShowIconPicker(!showIconPicker)}
          title="Change icon"
          type="button"
        >
          {expense.icon}
        </button>
        {showIconPicker && (
          <div className="icon-picker">
            {EXPENSE_ICON_OPTIONS.map((icon) => (
              <button
                key={icon}
                className="icon-picker-item"
                onClick={() => handleIconSelect(icon)}
                type="button"
              >
                {icon}
              </button>
            ))}
          </div>
        )}
      </div>
      <input
        className="expense-name-input"
        value={expense.name}
        onChange={handleNameChange}
        placeholder="Category"
      />
      <div className="expense-amount-wrapper">
        <span className="expense-amount-prefix">{symbol}</span>
        <input
          className="expense-amount-input"
          type="number"
          value={expense.amount || ''}
          onChange={handleAmountChange}
          placeholder="0"
        />
      </div>
      <button className="expense-remove-btn" onClick={handleRemove} title="Remove" type="button">
        ✕
      </button>
    </div>
  );
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/components/calculator/ChartSection.tsx
import React from 'react';
import { useFinance } from '@/state/FinanceContext';
import { useCalculations } from '@/hooks/useCalculations';
import { DonutChart, DonutLegend } from '@/components/charts/DonutChart';
import { Panel } from '@/components/ui/Panel';
import { formatCurrency } from '@/utils/format';

const EXPENSE_COLORS = [
  '#3ecf8e', '#4fc3f7', '#ffb74d', '#e57373',
  '#ba68c8', '#4dd0e1', '#fff176', '#a1887f',
  '#90a4ae', '#f06292', '#aed581', '#7986cb',
];

const SAVINGS_COLOR = '#1de9b6';

export function ChartSection() {
  const { state } = useFinance();
  const calc = useCalculations();
  const { currency, expenses } = state;

  const expenseSegments = expenses
    .filter((e) => e.amount > 0)
    .map((e, i) => ({
      label: e.name || 'Unnamed',
      value: e.amount,
      color: EXPENSE_COLORS[i % EXPENSE_COLORS.length],
    }));

  const savingsSegment = {
    label: 'Savings',
    value: Math.max(0, calc.monthlySavings),
    color: SAVINGS_COLOR,
  };

  const allSegments = [...expenseSegments, savingsSegment];

  return (
    <Panel className="chart-section">
      <div className="chart-container">
        <DonutChart
          segments={allSegments}
          centerValue={formatCurrency(calc.totalMonthlyExpenses, currency)}
          centerLabel="Total Expenses"
          size={240}
        />
        <div className="chart-side-labels">
          {calc.monthlySavings > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--savings">
              <span className="chart-side-value">{formatCurrency(calc.monthlySavings, currency)}</span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">Savings</span>
            </div>
          )}
          {expenses.filter(e => e.amount > 0).length > 0 && (
            <div className="chart-side-label chart-side-label--top-expense">
              <span className="chart-side-value">
                {formatCurrency(
                  Math.max(...expenses.map((e) => e.amount)),
                  currency
                )}
              </span>
              <span className="chart-side-text">
                {expenses.reduce((a, b) => (a.amount > b.amount ? a : b), expenses[0])?.name}
              </span>
            </div>
          )}
        </div>
      </div>
      <DonutLegend
        segments={allSegments}
        formatValue={(v) => formatCurrency(v, currency)}
      />
    </Panel>
  );
}
````

import React from 'react';

export function PlaceholderPage() {

  const pageName = location.pathname
    .replace('/', '')
    .replace(/-/g, ' ')
    .replace(/\b\w/g, (c) => c.toUpperCase()) || 'Page';

  return (
    <div className="placeholder-page">
      <div className="placeholder-content">
        <h1>{pageName}</h1>
        <p>Coming soon.</p>
      </div>
    </div>
  );
}

````css
/* filepath: vibe_finance/src/styles/index.css */

/* ========================================
   CSS CUSTOM PROPERTIES / THEME
   ======================================== */

:root {
  /* Base font */
  --font-family: 'Inter', -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto,
    sans-serif;
  --font-mono: 'Fira Code', 'Consolas', monospace;

  /* Sizing */
  --radius-sm: 6px;
  --radius-md: 10px;
  --radius-lg: 16px;
  --radius-xl: 20px;

  /* Transitions */
  --transition-fast: 150ms ease;
  --transition-normal: 250ms ease;
}

/* ---- Dark theme (default) ---- */
[data-theme='dark'],
:root {
  --color-bg: #0b0e17;
  --color-bg-elevated: #111827;
  --color-bg-panel: #151c2c;
  --color-bg-input: #1a2236;
  --color-border: #1e2a40;
  --color-border-focus: #3ecf8e;
  --color-text-primary: #e8ecf1;
  --color-text-secondary: #8b95a8;
  --color-text-muted: #5a6478;
  --color-accent: #3ecf8e;
  --color-accent-hover: #34b87c;
  --color-accent-glow: rgba(62, 207, 142, 0.15);
  --color-danger: #e57373;
  --color-info: #4fc3f7;
  --color-warning: #ffb74d;
  --color-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  --header-bg: rgba(11, 14, 23, 0.85);
}

/* ---- Light theme ---- */
[data-theme='light'] {
  --color-bg: #f0f2f5;
  --color-bg-elevated: #ffffff;
  --color-bg-panel: #ffffff;
  --color-bg-input: #f5f7fa;
  --color-border: #dce1e8;
  --color-border-focus: #2aa66d;
  --color-text-primary: #1a1d23;
  --color-text-secondary: #5a6478;
  --color-text-muted: #8b95a8;
  --color-accent: #2aa66d;
  --color-accent-hover: #22925e;
  --color-accent-glow: rgba(42, 166, 109, 0.12);
  --color-danger: #d32f2f;
  --color-info: #1e88e5;
  --color-warning: #f57c00;
  --color-shadow: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.08);
  --header-bg: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9);
}

/* ========================================
   RESET & BASE
   ======================================== */

*,
*::before,
*::after {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  box-sizing: border-box;
}

html {
  font-size: 16px;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
  -moz-osx-font-smoothing: grayscale;
}

body {
  font-family: var(--font-family);
  background-color: var(--color-bg);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  line-height: 1.6;
  min-height: 100vh;
}

a {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}

button {
  font-family: inherit;
  cursor: pointer;
  border: none;
  background: none;
}

input,
select {
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: inherit;
}

/* ========================================
   LAYOUT
   ======================================== */

.app-layout {
  min-height: 100vh;
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
}

.app-main {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 1200px;
  width: 100%;
  margin: 0 auto;
  padding: 24px 24px 48px;
}

/* ========================================
   HEADER
   ======================================== */

.header {
  position: sticky;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 100;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: space-between;
  padding: 0 24px;
  height: 56px;
  background: var(--header-bg);
  backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
  border-bottom: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}

.header-left {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 16px;
}

.header-logo {
  font-size: 1.4rem;
}

.header-title {
  font-size: 1rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.header-nav {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 4px;
  margin-left: 12px;
}

.header-nav-link {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  border-radius: var(--radius-sm);
  font-size: 0.85rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
  transition: color var(--transition-fast), background var(--transition-fast);
}

.header-nav-link:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.header-nav-link--active {
  color: var(--color-accent);
  font-weight: 600;
}

.header-right {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  gap: 10px;
}

/* ========================================
   PANEL
   ======================================== */

.panel {
  background: var(--color-bg-panel);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-lg);
  padding: 20px;
}

/* ========================================
   BUTTONS
   ======================================== */

.btn {
  display: inline-flex;
  align-items: center;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 600;
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  transition: all var(--transition-fast);
}

.btn--sm {
  padding: 6px 12px;
  font-size: 0.8rem;
}
.btn--md {
  padding: 10px 20px;
  font-size: 0.9rem;
}
.btn--lg {
  padding: 14px 28px;
  font-size: 1rem;
}

.btn--full {
  width: 100%;
}

.btn--primary {
  background: linear-gradient(135deg, var(--color-accent), var(--color-accent-hover));
  color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 12px var(--color-accent-glow);
}
.btn--primary:hover {
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 4px 20px var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--secondary {
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
}
.btn--secondary:hover {
  border-color: var(--color-accent);
}

.btn--ghost {
  background: transparent;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}
.btn--ghost:hover {
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  background: var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.btn--danger {
  background: var(--color-danger);
  color: #fff;
}

/* ========================================
   INPUTS
   ======================================== */

.input-group {
  display: flex;
  flex-direction: column;
  gap: 6px;
}

.input-label {
  font-size: 0.82rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: var(--color-text-secondary);
}

.input-wrapper {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  overflow: hidden;
  transition: border-color var(--transition-fast);
}

.input-wrapper:focus-within {
  border-color: var(--color-border-focus);
  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px var(--color-accent-glow);
}

.input-prefix {
  padding: 10px 0 10px 14px;
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
  font-weight: 500;
  font-size: 1rem;
  user-select: none;
}

.input-field {
  flex: 1;
  padding: 10px 14px;
  background: transparent;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  font-size: 1.1rem;
  font-weight: 600;
}

.input-field::placeholder {
  color: var(--color-text-muted);
}

/* Hide number spinners */
.input-field::-webkit-inner-spin-button,
.input-field::-webkit-outer-spin-button {
  -webkit-appearance: none;
  margin: 0;
}
.input-field[type='number'] {
  -moz-appearance: textfield;
}

/* ========================================
   SELECT
   ======================================== */

.select-field {
  background: var(--color-bg-input);
  border: 1px solid var(--color-border);
  border-radius: var(--radius-md);
  padding: 8px 32px 8px 12px;
  color: var(--color-text-primary);
  font-size: 0.85rem;

## Step 3: Utility Functions

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/calculations.ts
import { Expense, IncomeState } from '@/types';

export function getMonthlyIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'annually') {
    return income.baseAmount / 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getAnnualIncome(income: IncomeState): number {
  if (income.frequency === 'monthly') {
    return income.baseAmount * 12;
  }
  return income.baseAmount;
}

export function getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return expenses.reduce((sum, e) => sum + e.amount, 0);
}

export function getMonthlySavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlyIncome(income) - getTotalMonthlyExpenses(expenses);
}

export function getSavingsRate(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  const monthly = getMonthlyIncome(income);
  if (monthly <= 0) return 0;
  const savings = getMonthlySavings(income, expenses);
  return Math.round((savings / monthly) * 100);
}

export function getAnnualSavings(income: IncomeState, expenses: Expense[]): number {
  return getMonthlySavings(income, expenses) * 12;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/format.ts
import { Currency, CURRENCY_SYMBOLS } from '@/types';

export function formatCurrency(amount: number, currency: Currency): string {
  const symbol = CURRENCY_SYMBOLS[currency];
  const absAmount = Math.abs(amount);
  const formatted = absAmount.toLocaleString('en-GB', {
    minimumFractionDigits: 0,
    maximumFractionDigits: 0,
  });
  return amount < 0 ? `-${symbol}${formatted}` : `${symbol}${formatted}`;
}

export function formatPercent(value: number): string {
  return `${value}%`;
}
````

````typescript
// filepath: vibe_finance/src/utils/storage.ts
export function loadFromStorage<T>(key: string, fallback: T): T {
  try {
    const raw = localStorage.getItem(key);
    if (raw === null) return fallback;
    return JSON.parse(raw) as T;
  } catch {
    return fallback;
  }
}

export function saveToStorage<T>(key: string, value: T): void {
  try {
    localStorage.setItem(key, JSON.stringify(value));
  } catch {
    // silently fail
  }
}
````
